info.description: This is the EnMasse API specification.
info.title: EnMasse REST API

parameters.description: A selector to restrict the list of returned objects by their labels. Defaults to everything.
parameters.name: labelSelector

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of MessagingUser to read. Must include addressSpace and dot separator in the name (that is, 'myspace.user1').

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of MessagingUser to replace. Must include addressSpace and dot separator in the name (that is, 'myspace.user1').

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of MessagingUser to delete. Must include addressSpace and dot separator in the name (that is, 'myspace.user1').

password.description: Base64 encoded value of password when 'password' type is specified.

provider.description: Name of provider to use for federated identity when 'federated' type is specified.

federatedUserid.description: User id of the user to federate when 'federated' type is specified.

federatedUsername.description: User name of the user to federate when 'federated' type is specified.

items.description: Addresses can be specified using exact values (that is, 'myqueue'), or glob patterns (that is, '*', or 'queue*').

Status.description: Status is a return value for calls that do not return other objects.

code.description: Suggested HTTP return code for this status, 0 if not set.

ObjectMeta.description: ObjectMeta is metadata that all persisted resources must have, which includes all objects users must create.

io.enmasse.v1alpha1.AddressSpaceType.description: AddressSpaceType is the type of address space (standard, brokered). Each type supports different types of addresses and semantics for those types.

io.enmasse.v1alpha1.AddressType.description: Type of address (queue, topic, ...). Each address type support different kinds of messaging semantics.
